verses.name: Zechariah 3:4
verses.text: And he answered and spake unto those that stood before him, saying, Take away the filthy garments from him. And unto him he said, Behold, I have caused thine iniquity to pass from thee, and I will clothe thee with change of raiment.

verses.name: Zechariah 3:5
verses.text: And I said, Let them set a fair mitre upon his head. So they set a fair mitre upon his head, and clothed him with garments. And the angel of the Lord stood by.

verses.name: Zechariah 3:6
verses.text: And the angel of the Lord protested unto Joshua, saying,
